MAIN_MESSAGE: This is an update for customers in the G66 postcode area of Kirkintilloch. Following a previous power cut caused by third party damage to our underground cable network in Cowgate, our engineers need to carry an emergency shutdown at 6pm to return the network back to normal. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.35pm on Thursday 19th November 2020.
